# maximumNumberOfTitleLines

**Instance Property**

The number of lines the menu displays for an item’s title or subtitle before it truncates the text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maximumNumberOfTitleLines: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenu] restricts the number of lines in a menu item’s title or subtitle to create a balance between a compact and expressive display. If you dynamically prepare menu items that might contain more text, set this value to a higher number and use this object as the menu’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenu/displayPreferences].
